snippet: The verdict against Silvio Berlusconi, the former Italian prime minister, is expected to weaken his position as talks begin on forming a coalition government.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi is convicted and sentenced to one year in prison for his role in publication of wiretapped conversation in newspaper his family owns; conviction, Berlusconi's second in five months, promise to weaken his position in negotiations to form governing coalition.
lead_paragraph: The verdict against Silvio Berlusconi, the former Italian prime minister, is expected to weaken his position as talks begin on forming a coalition government.

headline.seo: Berlusconi Gets One-Year Sentence Over Wiretapping Case
headline.main: Berlusconi Gets One-Year Sentence Over Wiretapping Case
headline.print_headline: Italy: Berlusconi Is Found Guilty, Again

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
